tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_findings (
  study_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  stem_cell_type VARCHAR(255),
  research_method TEXT,
  effect_description TEXT,
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_findings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stem_cell_type VARCHAR(50),
  findings TEXT,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_authors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  author_name VARCHAR(100),
  institution VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  field_of_study VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE StemCellResearch (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  research_title TEXT NOT NULL,
  research_author TEXT NOT NULL,
  publication_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PublicationJournals (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  journal_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  publication_year INTEGER,
  impact_factor FLOAT,
  website_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT,
  cell_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  group_id INT,
  result_data JSON,
  result_date DATE
);
